titleStmt.title: A funerall poeme. Vpon the death of the most vvorthie and true souldier; Sir Francis Vere, Knight. Captaine of Portsmouth, &c. L. Gouernour of his Maiesties cautionarie towne of Briell in Holland, &c.
titleStmt.author: Tourneur, Cyril, 1575?-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for Eleazar Edgar,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
